description.value: You partially untether an ally from the flow of time, enabling them to perform minor tasks with remarkable speed. The target can immediately perform one of the following actions without spending an action: provide @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.R33uiOMesYP0ISWl#covering-fire]{Covering Fire}; @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.SKgwxeMd2gB1g2W8#crawl]{Crawl}; @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.SKgwxeMd2gB1g2W8#draw-or-sheathe-a-weapon]{Draw or Sheathe a Weapon or Item}; provide @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.R33uiOMesYP0ISWl#harrying-fire]{Harrying Fire}; @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.SKgwxeMd2gB1g2W8#move-your-speed]{Move Your Speed}; @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.SKgwxeMd2gB1g2W8#stand-up]{Stand Up}; or take a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.SKgwxeMd2gB1g2W8#guarded-step]{Guarded Step}. For the spellâ€™s duration, the target can perform any of those actions as a swift action.
